title: Ranked Matchmaking
body: I am currently gold 5 and I've been playing ranked a lot recently and within 5 days, I already had eight un-ranked players with some only having below 100 wins in normals. Not in any of these games did the enemy team have a single un-ranked player. For example in one of my games, we had two un-ranked players (one with 15 normal wins and the other with 2 normal wins), two gold 5 players and one silver 1 player. The enemy team had three gold 5 players, one silver 4 and one silver 2. LIKE WTF RITO. Even though the mmr gap is huge, I still lost 20+ lp. PLS FIX YOUR MATCHMAKING SYSTEM RITO!

replies.body: do you think RIOT will give a fu.ck ? if yes please don't dream
